```c
}
```

### 7.c if else：大きい方を出力

```c
#define _CRT_SECURE_NO_WARNINGS
#include <stdio.h>

int main(void) 
{
	int num1 = 0, num2 = 0, max = 0;

	printf("１つ目の整数を入力してください\n");
	scanf("%d", &num1);

	printf("２つ目の整数を入力してください\n");
```

### 8.5 BMIの計算・判定

```c
#define _CRT_SECURE_NO_WARNINGS
#include <stdio.h>

int main(void)
{
	int height1;
	double height, weight, BMI, std = 0;
	printf("身長(cm)を入力してください\n");
	scanf("%d", &height1);

	height = height1 / 100.0;

	printf("体重(kg)を入力してください\n");
	scanf("%lf", &weight);

	BMI = weight / height / height;
	std = height * height * 22;

	if (BMI < 18.5) {
		printf("体重は標準より低いです\n");
	} else if (BMI < 25) {
		printf("体重は標準範囲です\n");
	} else {
		printf("体重は標準より高いです\n");
	}
	printf("BMI = %3.1f（標準体重は%4.2fです）\n", BMI, std);

	return 0;
}
```

```c
//解答
#include <stdio.h>

int main(void) {
	int kei, shiharai, tsuri, kazu;

	printf("合計金額を入力してください\n");
	scanf("%d", &kei);
	printf("支払額を入力してください\n");
	scanf("%d", &shiharai);

	tsuri = shiharai - kei;
	printf("お釣りは%d円です\n", tsuri);

	kazu = tsuri / 5000;
	tsuri = tsuri % 5000;
	printf("5000円札：%d枚\n", kazu);

	kazu = tsuri / 1000;
	tsuri = tsuri % 1000;
	printf("1000円札：%d枚\n", kazu);

	kazu = tsuri / 500;
	tsuri = tsuri % 500;
	printf("500円玉：%d枚\n", kazu);

	kazu = tsuri / 100;
	tsuri = tsuri % 100;
	printf("100円玉：%d枚\n", kazu);

	kazu = tsuri / 50;
	tsuri = tsuri % 50;
	printf("50円玉：%d枚\n", kazu);

	kazu = tsuri / 10;
	tsuri = tsuri % 10;
	printf("10円玉：%d枚\n", kazu);

	kazu = tsuri / 5;
	tsuri = tsuri % 5;
	printf("5円玉：%d枚\n", kazu);
	printf("1円玉：%d枚\n", tsuri);

	return 0;
}
```

### 9.b switch

```c
#define _CRT_SECURE_NO_WARNINGS
#include <stdio.h>

int main(void)
{
	int tmp = 0;
	printf("該当する月の記号(a, b, c, d)を入力してください\n");
	printf("a: 3-5月, b: 6-8月, c: 9-11月, d: 12-2月\n");
	printf(">>");
	scanf("%c", &tmp);

	switch(tmp)
	{
	case 'a':
		printf("季節は春です\n");
		break;

	case 'b':
		printf("季節は夏です\n");
		break;

	case 'c':
		printf("季節は秋です\n");
		break;

	case 'd':
		printf("季節は冬です\n");
		break;

	default:
		printf("入力が間違っています\n");
		break;
	}

	return 0;
}
```

```c
#define _CRT_SECURE_NO_WARNINGS
```

```c
int main(void) {
	int data[100];
	int i, temp;

	FILE *fp1, *fp2;
	fp1 = fopen("data.txt", "r");
	fp2 = fopen("sorted.txt", "w");

	if (fp1 == NULL) {
		printf("data.txtのオープンに失敗しました\n");
		return -1;
	}
	if (fp2 == NULL) {
		printf("sorted.txtのオープンに失敗しました\n");
		return -1;
	}

	for(i = 0; i < 100; i++) {
		fscanf(fp1, "%d", &data[i]);
	}

	for(i = 98; i >= 0; i--) {
		for(int j = 0; j <= i; j++) {
			if(data[j] > data[j + 1]) {
				temp = data[j + 1];
				data[j + 1] = data[j];
				data[j] = temp;
			}
		}
	}

	for(i = 0; i < 100; i++) {
		printf("data[%d] = %5d\n", i, data[i]);
		fprintf(fp2, "%5d\n", data[i]);
	}
	
	fclose(fp1);
	fclose(fp2);
	return 0;
}
```

### 21.4 𝜋計算機と.csv出力

```c
#define _CRT_SECURE_NO_WARNINGS
#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <time.h>

//generate random numbers
double rnd(void) {
	double ransu;
	ransu = (double)rand()/(RAND_MAX + 0.1);
	return ransu;
}

int main(void) {
	srand((unsigned int)time(NULL));

	double data[2];
	double pi = 4.0;
	int inside = 0;
	int outside = 0;
	int i;

////create file reader, exception, close file
	FILE *fp;
	fp = fopen("pi.csv", "w");

	if (fp == NULL) {
		printf("pi.csvのオープンに失敗しました\n");
		return -1;
	}
	
	printf("pi.csvのオープンに成功しました\n");
	printf("pi.csvにシミュレーション結果を書き込みます\n");
	
//repeat 500 times
	for (i = 0; i < 500; i++) {
		data[0] = rnd();
		data[1] = rnd();

//whether is in the fan
		if(data[0] * data[0] + data[1] * data[1] <= 1.0) {
			inside++;
		} else {
			outside++;
		}
		printf("%d - x = %f, y = %f, inside = %d, outside = %d\n", i + 1, data[0], data[1], inside, outside);

//re-calc pi
		pi = inside * 4.0 / (inside + outside);

//write # of times + pi into pi.csv file
		fprintf(fp, "%d, %f,\n", i + 1, pi);
	}

	fclose(fp);
	return 0;
}
```
